surge.tools.rhythmtools package¶

Submodules¶

surge.tools.rhythmtools.BinaryPatternSubdivider module¶

class surge.tools.rhythmtools.BinaryPatternSubdivider.BinaryPatternSubdivider(binary_pattern, rotation_cycle=0, second_level_subdivider=None, second_level_subdivision_pattern=None, sustain_mask=None, silence_mask=None)[source]¶

Bases: surge.tools.rhythmtools.Subdivider.Subdivider

Binary pattern subdivider.

::
>>> b = BinaryPatternSubdivider([1,0,1])
>>> b(6)
Ratio((2, 1, 2, 1))

>>> b = BinaryPatternSubdivider([1,0,1])
>>> b(7)
Ratio((2, 1, 2, 1, 1))

surge.tools.rhythmtools.ConstantProlater module¶

class surge.tools.rhythmtools.ConstantProlater.ConstantProlater(prolation_cycle, unit=None)[source]¶

A constant prolater.

::
>>> p = ConstantProlater([5,6,7])
>>> for i in range(4):
...     print(p(4,8))
5
6
7
5

surge.tools.rhythmtools.DifferenceProlater module¶

class surge.tools.rhythmtools.DifferenceProlater.DifferenceProlater(difference_cycle, unit=None)[source]¶

Difference prolater

::
>>> d = DifferenceProlater([-1, 0, 1])
>>> for i in range(4):
...     print(d(3,4))
2
3
4
2

surge.tools.rhythmtools.EvenSubdivider module¶

class surge.tools.rhythmtools.EvenSubdivider.EvenSubdivider(n_cycle, rotation_cycle=0, second_level_subdivider=None, second_level_subdivision_pattern=None, sustain_mask=None, silence_mask=None)[source]¶

Bases: surge.tools.rhythmtools.Subdivider.Subdivider

Even subdivider.

::
>>> e = EvenSubdivider([3, 2])
>>> e(5)
Ratio((2, 2, 1))
>>> e(5)
Ratio((2, 3))
>>> e = EvenSubdivider([3], rotation_cycle=[0,1,2])
>>> e(5)
Ratio((2, 2, 1))
>>> e(5)
Ratio((2, 1, 2))
>>> e(5)
Ratio((1, 2, 2))

surge.tools.rhythmtools.Subdivider module¶

Abstract base class for subdivision makers

surge.tools.rhythmtools.UnitSubdivider module¶

class surge.tools.rhythmtools.UnitSubdivider.UnitSubdivider(multiplier=1, rotation_cycle=0, second_level_subdivider=None, second_level_subdivision_pattern=None, sustain_mask=None, silence_mask=None)[source]¶

Bases: surge.tools.rhythmtools.Subdivider.Subdivider

Even subdivider.

::
>>> u = UnitSubdivider()
>>> u(3)
Ratio((1, 1, 1))

>>> u = UnitSubdivider(multiplier=2)
>>> u(3)
Ratio((1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1))

>>> u = UnitSubdivider(multiplier=1.5)
>>> u(2)
Ratio((1, 1, 1))

>>> u = UnitSubdivider(multiplier=1.5)
>>> u(3)
Ratio((1, 1, 1, 1, 1))

>>> from abjad import patterntools
>>> from abjad import rhythmmakertools
>>> pattern = patterntools.Pattern(indices=[2, 4], period=5)
>>> sustain_mask = rhythmmakertools.SustainMask(pattern)
>>> u = UnitSubdivider(
...     rotation_cycle=[0, 1],
...     sustain_mask=sustain_mask
... )
>>> u(5)
Ratio((1, 2, 2))
>>> u(5)
Ratio((2, 2, 1))

surge.tools.rhythmtools.bifurcate_duration module¶

Recursively subdivides a duration into two parts.

surge.tools.rhythmtools.bifurcate_duration.bifurcate_duration(duration, minimum_denominator=8, allowable_leafs=(Duration(3, 8), Duration(5, 16), Duration(1, 2), Duration(7, 16), Duration(5, 8), Duration(3, 4)), minimum_duration=Duration(3, 8), even='disallowed', bigger='left')[source]¶
